<cs> my lords i regret that the noble lord has not read my works on the subject for this is exactly what i have said not once or twice but on many occasions and with a great deal of emphasis <e> <s> a high nominal rate of taxation necessarily leads to all kinds of evasion and avoidance devices you get to the situation of taxing more and more on less and less and you end up with paying per cent <e> <s> on nothing <e>
